text: The 20th IIFA Awards (International Indian Film Academy Awards) were held on 18 September 2019. For the first time in the Awards' history, the awards were held in India, in Mumbai. The show was hosted by Ayushmann Khurrana and Aparshakti Khurana. The nominees were announced on 28 August 2019.https://www.iifa.com/collection/XU2KexEAAD2Eq3XC/undefined ==Winners and nominees== ===Merit Awards=== Sriram Raghavan — Best Director (Andhadhun) Ranveer Singh — Best Actor (Padmaavat) Alia Bhatt — Best Actress (Raazi) Vicky Kaushal — Best Supporting Actor (Sanju) Aditi Rao Hydari — Best Supporting Actress (Padmaavat) Ishaan Khatter — Best Male Debut (Dhadak) Sara Ali Khan — Best Female Debut (Kedarnath) {| class="wikitable" !
